title: Quotes to Scrape
text: Viewing tag: truth “The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept.” by George Carlin (about) “A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.” by Mark Twain (about) “The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.” by J.K. Rowling (about) “Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it.” by Mark Twain (about)
